name: Santa's Sleigh Slide
description: "Santa's Sleigh Slide" is a wild downhill fun ride where your aim is to collect 100 lost presents in total. *** Use the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys on your keyboard to steer the sleigh towards the Christmas tree in the valley *** Use the UP arrow to give your sleigh a little push *** Don't worry if you miss any presents on the way, you can restart from the top of the mountain as many times as you want to collect more!
